text: nimage tilidirali, allahana dutaru nim'ma naduve iddare. Heccina visayagalalli avaru nim'ma iccheyante nadedare, nive sankatakke silukuviri. Adare allahanu visvasavannu nimage priyavagisiruvanu hagu adannu nim'ma manas'sugalolage alankarisiruvanu mattu avanu dhikkara hagu papakrtyagalannu hagu avidheyateyannu nimage apriyavagisiruvanu. Inthavare, sanmargadalliruvavaru
